experiences.description: I work at Digital Amoeba. Digital Amoeba is a Corporate Innovation Lab by Telkom Indonesia that incubates and accelerates ideas from its employees which creates digital innovation and digital talents.
tasks: Developed dynamic and responsive website UIs using React JS and React Bootstrap within the Next.js framework.
Integrated front-end interfaces with back-end systems through RESTful APIs.
Collaborated closely with stakeholders, back-end developers, UI/UX designers, and system analysts/quality assurance teams to ensure seamless project execution.
Engaged in bug-fixing and troubleshooting to maintain and improve application performance.
Created reusable components to streamline development processes and enhance code maintainability.
Participated in a project that applied agile methodologies, particularly the Scrum framework, for efficient project management and iterative development.
Conducted daily, weekly, and monthly meetings to discuss project progress, mentor team members, and report work status.
Achieved project goals and targets set by the project owner consistently.
